text: "Untitled 03 | 05.28.2013.", (stylized "untitled 03 | 05.28.2013."), titled "Untitled 1" before its official release, is a song by American rapper Kendrick Lamar, featured on his compilation album, Untitled Unmastered. == Live performances == The song was performed publicly for the first time on December 16, 2014, on The Colbert Report, during promotion for Lamar's third studio album, To Pimp a Butterfly. == Charts == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Kendrick Lamar songs Category:Songs written by Kendrick Lamar Category:Songs written by Bilal (American singer) Category:Songs written by Thundercat (musician) Category:Songs written by Terrace Martin
title: Untitled 03 – 05.28.2013.
